head.title: Search phrases in {{FileFormatUp}} using {{EnvNameShort}}
head.description: The {{ProdFullName}} includes in {{ProgLang}} applications abilities to search text or whole phrases in document content.

header.title: Search for phrase in documents
header.description: Search for specific phrases using {{ProdFullName}}. Enrich {{EnvNameShort}} applications by efficient data search procedures.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdShortName}} features
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a comprehensive library for searching and indexing text in documents. It supports over 70 file formats, such as PDF, Word, Excel, images, and ZIP files, enabling efficient processing of large amounts of information.

more_features.title: Be known about {{EnvNameShort}} document search engine
more_features.description: The {{ProdFullName}} library allows search for specific phrases in 70+ file formats. Easily locate and manage data using our search tools.

feature_1.title: Phrase search
feature_1.content: Search for phrases across business documents, including PDFs, Words, Presentations and Spreadsheets. If you do not know the exact phrase use wildcards and other options.

feature_2.title: Data indexing
feature_2.content: Reusable search indexes allows to make document search more efficient. Create document data index structure and use it for text and phrases searching.

feature_3.title: Languages support
feature_3.content: Process documents written in 80 languages, using different keyboard layouts support and morphological word forms to enhance search efficiency.

feature_4.title: Flexible search options
feature_4.content: Our search options opens access to features like case sensitivity, fuzzy and homophone search, documents filtering and many other.

formats.title: Phrase search in business document
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} provide search in 70+ document formats. Leverage search options and use indexing to save time and effort.

operations.title: Advanced features
operations.description: Explore advanced and efficient search functionalities.

steps.title: How to search phrases in {{FileFormatUp}} documents

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes searching data in {{FileFormatUp}} documents easier. It provides many options to get appropriate search results in {{EnvName}} applications.

code_1.title: Using advanced search techniques
code_1.content: How to construct queries for searching in {{FileFormatUp}}.
code_1.comment_2: Path to the documents to be searched
